title: Siggy's Good Food - Manhattan
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Homestyle comfort slow-cooked food. Has a vegan veggie burger and a tofu lasagna with roasted eggplant, veggies, and tofu. Other choices include salads, smoothies, and fresh juices. Displays local artworks. Another location in Brooklyn.
